name: (Pantheon|Add new App) Add new App negative [2.1.15 Add New App - The required field is empty]
id: stories/pantheon/UserApps.story;(Pantheon|Add new App) Add new App negative [2.1.15 Add New App - The required field is empty]

testSteps.description: (Pantheon|Add new App) Add new App negative [2.1.15 Add New App - The required field is empty] #1: {appFormField=Application name, appName=mamaxF-Appd2, message=Callback URL is required for Oauth Product}

children.description: Given open Home page
Open page
And navigate to Pantheon LogIn page from Home page
Click log in
Is page opened
And navigate to Pantheon User Account page from LogIn page
Log in to app: TestUser, 1234567
Given navigate to Pantheon Add New App page from User Account page
Navigate to add new app page
When enter to the field {Application name} value {mamaxF-Appd2}
Enter value: Application name, mamaxF-Appd2
When save changes on Edit App Page
Apply changes
Then the message {Callback URL is required for Oauth Product} is displayed
Check if message is displayed: Callback URL is required for Oauth Product

testSteps.description: (Pantheon|Add new App) Add new App negative [2.1.15 Add New App - The required field is empty] #2: {appFormField=Redirect URI, appName=https://ticketmaster.com, message=Application name field is required.}

children.description: Given open Home page
Open page
And navigate to Pantheon LogIn page from Home page
Click log in
Is page opened
And navigate to Pantheon User Account page from LogIn page
Log in to app: TestUser, 1234567
Given navigate to Pantheon Add New App page from User Account page
Navigate to add new app page
When enter to the field {Redirect URI} value {https://ticketmaster.com}
Enter value: Redirect URI, https://ticketmaster.com
When save changes on Edit App Page
Apply changes
Then the message {Application name field is required.} is displayed
Check if message is displayed: Application name field is required.

userStory.narrative:
In order to manage my Apps
As a user of Ticket Master Developer portal
I want to perform CRUD operations with my apps
